text: Pont-l'Évêque is the name of two communes in France: * Pont-l'Évêque, Calvados, in the Calvados department * Pont-l'Évêque, Oise, in the Oise department == Other == * Pont-l'évêque cheese, named after the commune in Normandy * Pont-Évêque, a commune in the Isère department
title: Pont-l'Évêque
